newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Styl to buy additional 13,000 own shares.
newsitem.headline: Styl to buy additional 13,000 own shares.

text.p: Hungarian clothing manufacturer Styl Ruhagyar Rt said it gave a commission to a brokerage for the buyback of an additional 13,000 of its own shares.
In a statement, published in the official bourse gazette this morning, Styl said that the order, to be met at market price, was lodged on December 17.
This was Styl's second order to buy own shares in the past week, as the company lodged a similar order for 10,000 shares on December 11.
Styl, which did not give a reason for the purchase, has an issued share capital of 1.18 billion forints, made up of 1,000 forint face value stocks.
On Tuesday Styl shares finished at 1,300 forints, up 400, with only two stocks traded.
